casebody.data:
No. 37,

Misc.

Davis v. North Carolina. Conrad 0. Pearson for petitioner. T. W. Bruton, Attorney General of North Carolina, and James F. Bullock, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

C. A. 4th Cir. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. The case is transferred to the appellate docket.
